data.name: DOA6 Season Pass 1
data.detailed_description:
This Season Pass will apply to 62 costumes and 2 new characters released during the period of March 2019 - June 2019.

■ Season Pass 1 Bonus Content
- NiCO Technomancer Gear
- Nyotengu Wrestling Costume

■ Featured Content
- Happy Wedding Costumes Vol.1 (13 Costumes)
- Happy Wedding Costumes Vol.2 (13 Costumes)
- Pirates of the 7 Seas Costumes Vol.1 (13 Costumes)
- Pirates of the 7 Seas Costumes Vol.2 (13 Costumes)
- Additional Character: Mai Shiranui
- Mai Shiranui Debut Costumes (5 Costumes)
- Additional Character: Kula Diamond
- Kula Diamond Debut Costumes (5 Costumes)

■ Note:
- Please visit the official website for more details: https://www.gamecity.ne.jp/doa6/
- All content included in this Season Pass will also be sold separately. Please beware of redundant purchases.
- You must purchase the characters before using these costumes.

data.short_description: This Season Pass will apply to 62 costumes and 2 new characters released during the period of March 2019 - June 2019.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content
